conversations.content: Please get me the link to reset my TechServices password. It should be in an email I received recently.

<function_thought>
To locate the link for resetting the TechServices password, I need to find recent emails in the inbox that may contain the relevant link. The next step is to retrieve the unread emails to identify if any of them relate to the password reset. Since the current function trajectory is set to search for emails, I will proceed with executing that function.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_unread_emails()]</function_call>

    Tech Services Support'
